publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 98

l.foreign: מִזְמוֹר שִירוּ לַיְהֹוָה שִיר חָדָש כִי נִפְלָאוֹת
עָשָה הוֹשִיעָה לוֹ יְמִינוֹ וּזְרוֹעַ קָדְשוֹ ׃

ab.l: Miźmor da šira oḥujuz H-ɣa janɣy šira ki tamašalyḥ lar qyldy qutḥaradyr any on qudraty da aziz quvaty.
Biĺdirdi H jarlyɣašyn ḱoźĺarič́a ol ḥanlyḥlar- nyn ašḫartty rastlyɣyn.
Saɣyndy ševaɣatyn da inamlyɣyn juv́uńa Jiš́raʾeĺniń ḱord́uĺar bar qyryjdaɣylary jerniń jarlyɣašyn Teńri- miźniń.
Maḥtav qyčḥyryjyz H-ɣa bar eli ol jerniń bijanijiź da sarnajyz da zemer oḥujuz anar.
Zemer ajtyjyz qobuz byla H-ɣa qobuz byla qobuz byla da zemer avazy byla.
Ullu byrɣylar byla da avazy byla byrɣynyn maḥtav qyčḥyryjyz alnynda ol bijniń H-nyn.
Tol- ɣunlanyr ol t́eńgiź da tolusu dunja da olturuvčular anda.
Alnynda H-nyn ki kelir t́oŕa et́ḿa ol jerni t́oŕa et́ar dunja- ny rastlyḥ byla da uluslarny t́uźĺukĺar byla.
